hotels.address: Engine Bowli, Falaknuma, Hyderabad, Telangana 500053, India
hotels.description: A majestic palace hotel offering royal heritage stays with exquisite dining and grand interiors.

hotels.name: Park Hyatt Hyderabad
hotels.description: Ultra-luxurious hotel with exquisite dining and spa facilities

hotels.name: The Westin Hyderabad Mindspace
hotels.description: Premium hotel with heavenly beds and excellent business facilities

hotels.name: Hyatt Place Hyderabad Banjara Hills
hotels.description: Contemporary hotel with spacious rooms and modern amenities

hotels.name: Courtyard by Marriott Hyderabad
hotels.description: Stylish hotel with excellent service and dining options

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad HITEC City
hotels.description: Smart, simple hotel with essential business amenities

hotels.name: Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad
hotels.description: Budget-friendly hotel with modern design and comfortable rooms

hotels.name: Hotel Avasa
hotels.description: Boutique hotel with personalized service and elegant design

hotels.name: Taj Deccan
hotels.description: Heritage-style hotel with modern comforts and excellent cuisine

hotels.name: Fortune Select Manohar
hotels.description: Value-for-money business hotel with good facilities

hotels.name: Ibis Hyderabad HITEC City
hotels.description: Modern budget hotel with efficient service and comfortable beds

hotels.name: The Leela Palace Bengaluru
hotels.description: An architectural masterpiece inspired by Mysore's royal palaces, featuring 8 acres of lush gardens and opulent interiors. The hotel offers 357 lavish rooms with gold-leaf furnishings, a 10,000 sq ft spa with Ayurvedic therapies, and five gourmet dining venues. Guests enjoy personalized butler service, a stunning outdoor pool, and curated cultural experiences showcasing Karnataka's heritage.

hotels.name: Taj West End
hotels.description: A 19th-century colonial gem spread across 20 acres of botanical gardens with heritage bungalow-style accommodations. Features four dining venues including the legendary Blue Ginger Vietnamese restaurant and a spa using organic products. The property maintains its old-world charm with antique furnishings while offering modern business facilities and a temperature-controlled infinity pool.

hotels.name: ITC Gardenia
hotels.description: India's first LEED Platinum hotel featuring a stunning 15-floor vertical garden and eco-conscious luxury. Offers 292 rooms with aromatherapy amenities, 10 dining options including the famous Ottimo Italian restaurant, and a 10,000 sq ft spa. The property combines sustainability with opulence through rainwater harvesting, solar panels, and an extensive waste management system.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton
hotels.description: Bengaluru's premier luxury address featuring 277 elegant rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and marble bathrooms. Home to Bengaluru's highest rooftop bar, The Ritz-Carlton Spa with private treatment suites, and multiple award-winning restaurants. Offers exceptional meeting spaces including a grand ballroom with crystal chandeliers and cutting-edge technology for corporate events.

hotels.name: JW Marriott Bengaluru
hotels.description: Contemporary luxury hotel featuring 297 well-appointed rooms with ergonomic workspaces and marble bathrooms. Highlights include Alba - one of Bengaluru's largest all-day dining restaurants, and the Quan Spa with Asian-inspired therapies. The grand ballroom accommodates 1,000 guests, making it a preferred venue for weddings and corporate events in the city center.

hotels.name: Conrad Bengaluru
hotels.description: Sophisticated high-rise hotel offering 223 smart rooms with iPad controls and walk-in rain showers. Features a stunning rooftop pool deck with city views and an award-winning Indian restaurant with live ghazal performances. The Conrad Spa provides holistic wellness programs while 11 meeting rooms cater to business travelers with natural light and modern technology.

hotels.name: Vivanta Bengaluru, Whitefield
hotels.description: Designed for tech-savvy travelers near ITPL, featuring modern rooms with ergonomic workstations and high-speed connectivity. Offers all-day dining at Latitude, a rooftop pool with cabanas, and flexible meeting spaces. The hotel's location makes it ideal for business travelers with easy access to major tech parks and the international airport.

hotels.name: The Lalit Ashok
hotels.description: Spread across 10 acres of landscaped gardens, this heritage-style hotel offers 184 rooms with modern amenities. Features include an outdoor pool, the Rejuve Spa with Ayurvedic treatments, and multiple dining options. The property combines old-world charm with contemporary facilities, making it popular for both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road
hotels.description: Modern hotel with 228 contemporary rooms featuring ergonomic workspaces and soundproof windows. Offers all-day dining at The Square, a rooftop pool with city views, and 15,000 sq ft of meeting space. Conveniently located near major tech parks with complimentary shuttle service to business districts.

hotels.name: Blu Atria Bengaluru
hotels.description: Business-friendly hotel in central Bengaluru offering 120 well-appointed rooms with work desks and high-speed internet. Features include a multi-cuisine restaurant, 24-hour fitness center, and flexible meeting spaces. The hotel's prime location provides easy access to commercial hubs and shopping districts.

hotels.name: Taj Yeshwantpur
hotels.description: Modern business hotel in north Bengaluru featuring 153 rooms with contemporary decor and ergonomic workstations. Offers all-day dining at The Square Meal, a rooftop infinity pool, and 10,000 sq ft of meeting space. The property's location near Yeshwantpur railway station makes it convenient for business travelers.

hotels.name: Hyatt Centric MG Road Bengaluru
hotels.description: Vibrant lifestyle hotel on MG Road featuring 123 contemporary rooms with local artwork and smart technology. Highlights include a rooftop bar with city views, an all-day diner serving global cuisine, and a 24-hour fitness center. The hotel's central location makes it ideal for exploring Bengaluru's shopping and entertainment districts.

hotels.name: The Oberoi Bengaluru
hotels.description: Elegant luxury hotel featuring 150 spacious rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and marble bathrooms. Offers fine dining at Le Jardin, a serene spa with Ayurvedic treatments, and personalized butler service. The property combines contemporary design with impeccable service standards, making it a favorite among discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Premier, Ulsoor Lake
hotels.description: Contemporary hotel overlooking Ulsoor Lake featuring 120 vibrant rooms with modern amenities. Offers all-day dining at Citrus Cafe, a rooftop pool with lake views, and flexible meeting spaces. The property's lakeside location provides a tranquil retreat while being close to Bengaluru's business districts.

hotels.name: ibis Bengaluru City Centre
hotels.description: Budget-friendly hotel offering 180 compact yet comfortable rooms with ergonomic workstations. Features include 24-hour dining at Spice It, a fitness center, and flexible meeting spaces. The central location near MG Road makes it convenient for both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Treebo Trend Skylark
hotels.description: Value hotel offering 45 clean, well-maintained rooms with essential amenities in central Bengaluru. Provides complimentary breakfast, free WiFi, and 24-hour front desk service. The property's location near commercial areas makes it popular among budget-conscious business travelers.

hotels.name: FabHotel Prime Avenue Suites
hotels.description: Budget hotel in Koramangala offering 32 compact rooms with modern decor and essential amenities. Features include complimentary breakfast, free WiFi, and 24-hour front desk service. The property's location in a popular neighborhood provides easy access to restaurants and shopping areas.

hotels.name: OYO Townhouse 010 MG Road
hotels.description: Budget accommodation offering standardized rooms with essential amenities in central Bengaluru. Features include free WiFi, 24-hour check-in, and housekeeping services. The MG Road location provides convenient access to shopping and business districts.

hotels.name: Hotel Royal Orchid
hotels.description: Golf course hotel featuring 165 rooms with modern decor and views of the greens. Offers all-day dining at Three Sixty, a spa, and outdoor pool. The property's location adjoining KGA Golf Course provides a peaceful retreat while being close to business districts.

hotels.name: The Paul Bengaluru
hotels.description: Boutique luxury hotel featuring 104 elegant rooms with contemporary art and designer furnishings. Offers fine dining at The Lobby, a spa with holistic treatments, and personalized service. The property's artistic ambiance and attention to detail create a unique upscale experience.

hotels.name: The Imperial New Delhi
hotels.address: Janpath, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
hotels.description: The Imperial New Delhi stands as a majestic testament to India's colonial heritage, blending art deco elegance with modern luxury. This iconic hotel features meticulously preserved architecture, lush tropical gardens, and an impressive art collection. Guests can indulge in world-class dining, including the famous 1911 Restaurant, and experience impeccable butler service. The spacious rooms and suites are adorned with period furnishings and offer a tranquil retreat in the heart of the city.

hotels.name: Taj Palace, New Delhi
hotels.address: 2, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110021, India
hotels.description: Taj Palace New Delhi is a grand luxury hotel spread over six acres of beautifully landscaped gardens in the prestigious Diplomatic Enclave. Known for its exquisite dining options including the Orient Express-themed restaurant, the hotel offers opulent accommodations with elegant decor and modern amenities. The property features an outdoor pool, rejuvenating spa, and impeccable service that reflects Indian hospitality at its finest. Its central location makes it ideal for both business and leisure travelers seeking luxury in the capital.

hotels.name: The Leela Palace New Delhi
hotels.address: Chanakyapuri, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110023, India
hotels.description: The Leela Palace New Delhi is a regal hotel inspired by Lutyens' Delhi and the grand palaces of India. This luxurious property features opulent interiors with hand-painted frescoes, crystal chandeliers, and rich fabrics. Guests can enjoy the award-winning ESPA spa, temperature-controlled outdoor pool, and multiple fine dining options including Indian and Japanese cuisine. The hotel's personalized butler service and attention to detail create an unforgettable experience of royal Indian hospitality in the heart of the capital.

hotels.name: The Lodhi
hotels.address: Lodhi Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110003, India
hotels.description: The Lodhi is New Delhi's most exclusive luxury hotel, offering contemporary design with private terraces and plunge pools in many suites. This urban resort features minimalist elegance with luxurious touches like walk-in rain showers and personalized butler service. The property boasts an expansive outdoor pool, holistic spa, and fine dining options with organic ingredients. Located near the Lodhi Gardens, the hotel provides a serene oasis while being conveniently close to Delhi's business and cultural centers.

hotels.name: ITC Maurya
hotels.address: Sardar Patel Marg, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, Delhi 110021, India
hotels.description: ITC Maurya is a landmark luxury hotel known for its distinctive architecture inspired by the Mauryan dynasty. The hotel is famous for its world-class restaurants, including Bukhara which has been consistently ranked among Asia's best. Guests can enjoy spacious rooms with contemporary Indian decor, a luxurious spa, and extensive business facilities. The hotel's central location in the diplomatic enclave makes it a preferred choice for heads of state and business leaders visiting the capital.

hotels.name: The Oberoi, New Delhi
hotels.address: Dr. Zakir Hussain Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110003, India
hotels.description: The Oberoi New Delhi offers a refined luxury experience with breathtaking views of the Delhi Golf Course and Humayun's Tomb. This elegant hotel features spacious rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows, marble bathrooms, and contemporary Indian artwork. Guests can enjoy the serene outdoor pool, world-class spa, and exceptional dining options including authentic Indian and international cuisines. The hotel's impeccable service and attention to detail make it one of Delhi's most prestigious addresses for discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Shangri-La's - Eros Hotel, New Delhi
hotels.address: 19, Ashoka Road, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
hotels.description: Shangri-La's Eros Hotel combines Asian hospitality with contemporary luxury in the heart of New Delhi's business district. The hotel features elegantly appointed rooms with modern amenities and stunning city views. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, CHI Spa with authentic Asian therapies, and multiple dining options including Indian and Pan-Asian cuisines. The hotel's central location near Connaught Place makes it ideal for both business and leisure travelers looking for comfort and convenience in the capital.

hotels.name: The Lalit New Delhi
hotels.address: Barakhamba Avenue, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
hotels.description: The Lalit New Delhi is a grand hotel offering luxurious accommodations and excellent convention facilities in the heart of the city. The property features beautifully appointed rooms with contemporary decor, multiple dining options including specialty restaurants, and an expansive spa with traditional Indian therapies. Known for its excellent banquet and meeting spaces, the hotel is a popular choice for weddings and corporate events. The central location near Connaught Place provides easy access to Delhi's business and shopping districts.

hotels.name: Pullman New Delhi Aerocity
hotels.address: Asset 2, Hospitality District, Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India
hotels.description: Pullman New Delhi Aerocity is a modern airport hotel designed for both business and leisure travelers with soundproof rooms that ensure peaceful rest. The hotel features contemporary design, efficient service, and excellent transit facilities being just minutes from the international airport. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, well-equipped fitness center, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. The property's convenient location in Aerocity makes it ideal for transit passengers and those attending events at the nearby convention centers.

hotels.name: The Park New Delhi
hotels.address: 15, Parliament Street, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
hotels.description: The Park New Delhi is a stylish boutique hotel known for its contemporary design and vibrant atmosphere in the heart of the city. The property features chic rooms with modern art, a popular rooftop lounge with city views, and innovative dining options. Guests can enjoy the spa, fitness center, and the hotel's central location near Connaught Place and government offices. The hotel's nightlife scene, including the famous Agni nightclub, makes it a favorite among younger travelers looking for both comfort and entertainment.

hotels.name: Blu Plaza Delhi Airport
hotels.address: National Highway 8, Mahipalpur, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India
hotels.description: Blu Plaza Delhi Airport is a comfortable hotel conveniently located near the international airport, offering efficient service and good connectivity to the city. The property features modern rooms with soundproof windows, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and well-equipped meeting spaces. Guests appreciate the 24-hour airport shuttle service, making it ideal for transit passengers and business travelers with early flights. While primarily functional, the hotel provides all necessary amenities for a comfortable short stay near the airport at reasonable rates.

hotels.name: Hyatt Regency Delhi
hotels.address: Bhikaiji Cama Place, Ring Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110066, India
hotels.description: Hyatt Regency Delhi is a business-friendly hotel offering excellent meeting facilities and comfortable accommodations in the commercial district. The property features spacious rooms with modern amenities, an outdoor pool, and multiple dining options including authentic Indian cuisine. The hotel's extensive conference and banquet spaces make it popular for corporate events and weddings. Located near major business hubs and shopping areas, it provides convenient access to both commercial and leisure attractions in the city.

hotels.name: The Suryaa New Delhi
hotels.address: New Friends Colony, New Delhi, Delhi 110025, India
hotels.description: The Suryaa New Delhi is a contemporary hotel located in the upscale New Friends Colony residential area, offering comfortable accommodations and good dining options. The property features well-appointed rooms with modern decor, a rooftop pool with city views, and multiple event spaces suitable for weddings and conferences. Guests can enjoy the spa, fitness center, and easy access to South Delhi's shopping and dining destinations. The hotel provides reliable service and facilities at competitive rates for both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Vivanta by Taj - Dwarka, New Delhi
hotels.address: Asset 1, Hospitality District, Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India
hotels.description: Vivanta by Taj Dwarka offers modern accommodations with smart design and excellent facilities near the international airport. The hotel features contemporary rooms with ergonomic workspaces, a rooftop pool with panoramic views, and multiple dining options including specialty Indian cuisine. Business travelers appreciate the well-equipped meeting rooms and convenient location in Aerocity. The property combines Taj's renowned hospitality with a more contemporary, value-oriented approach suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport
hotels.address: Asset 10A, Hospitality District, Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India
hotels.description: Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport is a reliable airport hotel offering comfortable accommodations and efficient service for transit passengers. The property features soundproof rooms to ensure restful sleep, a 24-hour restaurant, and well-equipped meeting spaces. Guests appreciate the complimentary airport shuttle service and convenient location in Aerocity. While primarily functional, the hotel provides all essential amenities for business and leisure travelers needing easy airport access at reasonable rates.

hotels.name: The Claridges New Delhi
hotels.address: 12, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110011, India
hotels.description: The Claridges New Delhi is a charming heritage-style hotel offering colonial elegance combined with modern comforts in the heart of Lutyens' Delhi. The property features beautifully landscaped gardens, elegant rooms with classic decor, and excellent dining options including European and Indian cuisines. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, spa services, and the hotel's tranquil atmosphere despite its central location. Known for its personalized service and old-world charm, the hotel appeals to those seeking a refined yet unpretentious experience in the capital.

hotels.name: Hotel Broadway
hotels.address: 4/15A, Asaf Ali Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110002, India
hotels.description: Hotel Broadway is a charming heritage property in Old Delhi that offers a glimpse into the city's rich history with its vintage decor and nostalgic atmosphere. The hotel features simply furnished rooms with basic amenities, a popular rooftop restaurant serving authentic Kashmiri cuisine, and a central location near Chandni Chowk. While not luxurious, the property appeals to travelers seeking character and history at reasonable rates. The hotel's old-world charm and proximity to Delhi's historic landmarks make it a unique budget option for adventurous travelers.

hotels.name: Hotel Palace Heights
hotels.address: D-26/28, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
hotels.description: Hotel Palace Heights is a boutique budget hotel located in the heart of Connaught Place, offering comfortable accommodations at reasonable rates. The property features compact but well-maintained rooms with modern amenities, a popular rooftop restaurant with city views, and a convenient location near shopping and business districts. While not luxurious, the hotel provides clean, functional spaces with friendly service. The central location makes it ideal for budget-conscious travelers who want to explore Delhi's commercial and cultural attractions without spending on luxury accommodations.

hotels.name: Hotel City Park
hotels.address: A-41, Near Naraina Flyover, New Delhi, Delhi 110028, India
hotels.description: Hotel City Park is a value-for-money accommodation offering basic but comfortable rooms in a convenient location near the commercial areas of West Delhi. The property features simply furnished rooms with essential amenities, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and good connectivity to both the airport and city center. While not luxurious, the hotel provides clean accommodations and reliable service at budget-friendly rates. The hotel appeals to business travelers and tourists looking for affordable lodging with decent facilities in a well-connected location.

hotels.name: OYO Flagship 73436 Hotel Delhi Inn
hotels.address: Paharganj, New Delhi, Delhi 110055, India
hotels.description: OYO Flagship Hotel Delhi Inn is a basic budget accommodation located in the bustling Paharganj area near New Delhi Railway Station. The property offers no-frills rooms with essential amenities like air conditioning and attached bathrooms, catering to backpackers and budget travelers. While the facilities are minimal, the hotel provides clean accommodations at very affordable rates in a central location. The area's vibrant street life and proximity to transportation hubs make it convenient for travelers arriving by train or those looking for inexpensive lodging before early morning flights.

hotels.name: Grand Hyatt Kochi Bolgatty
hotels.address: Bolgatty Island, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Grand Hyatt Kochi Bolgatty is a luxurious waterfront resort set on its own private island, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the serene backwaters. The property features elegant rooms with contemporary Kerala-inspired decor and private balconies overlooking the water. Guests can enjoy the infinity pool, world-class spa with Ayurvedic treatments, and multiple dining options including authentic Malabar cuisine. The resort's lush tropical gardens and private yacht transfers create an exclusive tropical paradise experience.

hotels.name: Taj Malabar Resort & Spa
hotels.address: Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Taj Malabar Resort & Spa is an iconic heritage property that beautifully preserves the colonial charm of old Kochi while offering modern luxury amenities. The hotel features elegant rooms with teak wood furnishings and stunning harbor views from its prime location on Willingdon Island. Guests can enjoy the renowned Ayurvedic spa, outdoor pool, and excellent seafood restaurants showcasing Kerala's culinary traditions. The historic wing's architecture and antique decor transport visitors back to Kochi's colonial era.

hotels.name: Le Méridien Kochi
hotels.address: Marine Drive, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Le Méridien Kochi offers spectacular harbor views from its prime Marine Drive location, combining contemporary luxury with Keralite cultural elements. The hotel features stylish rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows, an infinity pool, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. Its art-inspired design showcases local craftsmanship while providing modern business and leisure facilities. The convenient location provides easy access to both Ernakulam's business district and Fort Kochi's tourist attractions.

hotels.name: Brunton Boatyard
hotels.address: Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Brunton Boatyard is a unique heritage hotel housed in a beautifully restored 19th-century boatyard building in historic Fort Kochi. The property showcases colonial-era architecture with high ceilings, teak wood furnishings, and antique decor that transports guests back in time. Each room offers views of the harbor or the hotel's lush courtyard, while the rooftop restaurant serves excellent seafood with panoramic vistas. The hotel's commitment to preserving Kochi's maritime history creates an unforgettable stay experience in this charming coastal town.

hotels.name: Crowne Plaza Kochi
hotels.address: Kochi Infopark, Kakkanad, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Crowne Plaza Kochi is a modern business hotel located in the heart of the city's IT hub, offering excellent conference facilities and business amenities. The property features contemporary rooms with ergonomic workstations, a well-equipped fitness center, and multiple dining options including specialty Indian cuisine. The hotel's expansive meeting spaces and banquet halls make it popular for corporate events and weddings. Its location provides convenient access to Infopark while being just a short drive from Kochi's main attractions.

hotels.name: Forte Kochi
hotels.address: 2/6A, Calvathy Road, Fort Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Forte Kochi is a charming boutique heritage hotel showcasing Portuguese-inspired architecture in the heart of historic Fort Kochi. The property features individually decorated rooms with antique furniture, four-poster beds, and traditional Kerala artwork. Guests can relax in the peaceful courtyard garden or enjoy meals at the in-house restaurant specializing in local seafood dishes. Its prime location near the Chinese fishing nets and St. Francis Church makes it ideal for exploring Fort Kochi's colonial landmarks on foot.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Cochin
hotels.address: 33/1739, NH 47, Palarivattom, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Holiday Inn Cochin offers reliable accommodations with modern amenities in Kochi's commercial district, catering primarily to business travelers. The hotel features comfortable rooms with work desks, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including a 24-hour coffee shop. Its convenient location near Palarivattom Junction provides easy access to both the airport and major business hubs. The outdoor pool and fitness center offer relaxation options after a day of work or sightseeing.

hotels.name: Trident Cochin
hotels.address: Bristow Road, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Trident Cochin is a waterfront hotel offering excellent views of the Kochi harbor from its prime location on Willingdon Island. The property features spacious rooms with traditional Kerala design elements, a large outdoor pool, and specialty seafood restaurants. Guests can enjoy sunset views from the private jetty or explore nearby attractions like the Maritime Museum. The hotel's relaxed atmosphere and attentive service make it popular with both leisure travelers and business visitors seeking comfortable accommodations.

hotels.name: The Gateway Hotel Marine Drive
hotels.address: 1/34, Marine Drive, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: The Gateway Hotel Marine Drive offers comfortable accommodations with panoramic backwater views from its prime location along Kochi's famous Marine Drive promenade. The hotel features modern rooms with large windows, a multi-cuisine restaurant serving local specialties, and a rooftop swimming pool. Its central location provides easy access to Ernakulam's shopping districts and ferry terminals for trips to Fort Kochi. The property is particularly popular for its sunset views over the Arabian Sea and convenient access to local attractions.

hotels.name: Abad Atrium
hotels.address: SA Road, Kaloor, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Abad Atrium is a contemporary hotel offering comfortable accommodations in Kochi's commercial hub, known for its distinctive cylindrical glass tower design. The property features well-appointed rooms with modern amenities, a rooftop restaurant with city views, and convenient access to Kaloor's business and shopping areas. Guests appreciate the hotel's central location near the metro station and Jawaharlal Nehru International Stadium. The attentive service and good value make it popular with both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Casino Hotel
hotels.address: Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Casino Hotel is a historic property on Willingdon Island that has been welcoming guests since 1939, offering old-world charm with modern comforts. The hotel features simply decorated rooms with colonial-era touches, a renowned seafood restaurant specializing in Malabar cuisine, and a relaxed waterfront setting. Guests can enjoy views of the bustling Kochi harbor from the verandah or take short walks to nearby attractions. The property's heritage atmosphere and focus on authentic Kerala experiences make it popular with cultural travelers.

hotels.name: Ramada Cochin
hotels.address: Edapally, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Ramada Cochin is a modern hotel located in Edapally, offering comfortable accommodations with good business facilities and leisure amenities. The property features spacious rooms with contemporary decor, an outdoor swimming pool, and multiple dining options including a specialty restaurant. Its location near Lulu Mall and major transportation routes makes it convenient for both shopping and business purposes. The hotel's reliable service and good value attract both business travelers and families visiting Kochi.

hotels.name: The Mercy Heritage
hotels.address: Convent Road, Ernakulam, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: The Mercy Heritage is a comfortable hotel housed in a heritage-style building in central Ernakulam, offering old-world charm at affordable rates. The property features simply furnished rooms with basic amenities, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and a convenient location near shopping areas and transportation hubs. Guests appreciate the hotel's peaceful atmosphere despite its central location and easy access to Fort Kochi via ferry. The friendly service and value pricing make it popular with budget-conscious travelers exploring Kochi.

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Hotel
hotels.address: MG Road, Ernakulam, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Hotel Grand Hotel is a classic heritage property on MG Road that has been serving guests since 1930, offering old-world charm at budget-friendly rates. The hotel features simply furnished rooms with vintage decor elements, a popular rooftop restaurant, and a prime location in Ernakulam's shopping district. While the facilities are basic, the property maintains its historic character and provides clean accommodations. Its central location near the metro station and ferry terminal makes it convenient for exploring both Ernakulam and Fort Kochi.

hotels.name: Fort Heritage
hotels.address: 1/658, Princess Street, Fort Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Fort Heritage is a charming budget hotel housed in a restored colonial building in the heart of historic Fort Kochi, offering antique decor and old-world atmosphere. The property features simply furnished rooms with traditional Kerala elements, a cozy courtyard, and a prime location near the Chinese fishing nets and St. Francis Church. Guests appreciate the hotel's heritage character and easy access to Fort Kochi's main attractions on foot. The friendly staff and affordable rates make it popular with backpackers and cultural travelers.

hotels.name: The Old Lighthouse Bristow Hotel
hotels.address: 1/504, Bristow Road, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: The Old Lighthouse Bristow Hotel is a unique budget accommodation housed in a converted colonial building on Willingdon Island, offering waterfront views and historic charm. The property features basic but clean rooms with vintage decor elements, a seafood restaurant, and a relaxed atmosphere away from the city bustle. Guests enjoy watching ships navigate the harbor from the hotel's vantage point and exploring nearby maritime attractions. The hotel's heritage character and affordable rates appeal to travelers seeking an authentic Kochi experience.

hotels.name: Hotel Fort Castle
hotels.address: 1/359, Princess Street, Fort Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Hotel Fort Castle is a budget heritage property on Princess Street in Fort Kochi, showcasing Portuguese-style architecture and antique furnishings. The hotel features simply decorated rooms with basic amenities, a rooftop seating area, and a prime location near Fort Kochi Beach and the Chinese fishing nets. While facilities are modest, guests appreciate the property's old-world charm and proximity to major attractions. The affordable rates and heritage atmosphere make it popular with backpackers and budget-conscious cultural travelers.

hotels.name: Treebo Trend Sapphire
hotels.address: MG Road, Ernakulam, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Treebo Trend Sapphire offers clean, comfortable accommodations at budget-friendly rates in central Ernakulam, catering primarily to business travelers and tourists. The hotel features compact but well-maintained rooms with modern amenities, 24-hour room service, and a convenient location near MG Road's shopping areas. While facilities are basic, the property maintains good cleanliness standards and provides reliable service. Its central location near the metro station and ferry terminal makes it practical for exploring both Ernakulam and Fort Kochi.

hotels.name: OYO 123 Hotel Seagull
hotels.address: Fort Kochi Beach Road, Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: OYO 123 Hotel Seagull is a basic beachfront accommodation in Fort Kochi offering no-frills rooms at budget prices, just steps away from the Arabian Sea. The property features simply furnished rooms with essential amenities, some with partial sea views, and a convenient location near Fort Kochi's main attractions. While facilities are minimal, guests appreciate the prime beachfront location and affordable rates. The hotel caters to backpackers and budget travelers looking for inexpensive lodging in this historic neighborhood.

hotels.name: Koder House
hotels.address: 1/658, Tower Road, Fort Kochi, Kerala, India
hotels.description: Koder House is a charming heritage boutique hotel housed in a meticulously restored 1808 Jewish merchant's mansion in Fort Kochi, blending historic character with modern comforts. The property features individually decorated rooms with antique furnishings, a peaceful courtyard garden, and architectural details showcasing Kochi's multicultural history. Guests enjoy the personalized service and authentic atmosphere that reflects Fort Kochi's colonial-era charm. The hotel's prime location near the beach and major landmarks makes it ideal for cultural explorers seeking a unique stay experience.

hotels.name: Taj Mahal Palace
hotels.address: Apollo Bunder, Mumbai 400001
hotels.description: The Taj Mahal Palace is Mumbai's most iconic luxury hotel, standing majestically opposite the Gateway of India since 1903. This architectural masterpiece blends Indian and Saracenic styles, offering opulent rooms with antique furnishings and modern amenities. Guests can dine at world-class restaurants like Wasabi by Morimoto or enjoy afternoon tea in the Sea Lounge. The hotel's rich history includes hosting royalty and celebrities, while its impeccable service continues to set standards in Indian hospitality.

hotels.name: The Oberoi
hotels.address: Nariman Point, Mumbai 400021
hotels.description: The Oberoi Mumbai offers unparalleled luxury with breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea from its prime Nariman Point location. This elegant hotel features spacious rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows, marble bathrooms, and contemporary Indian artwork. Guests can enjoy the infinity pool overlooking the sea, the award-winning spa, and exceptional dining at Ziya restaurant. Known for its impeccable service and attention to detail, The Oberoi remains a favorite among discerning travelers seeking refined accommodations in Mumbai.

hotels.name: Trident Nariman Point
hotels.address: Nariman Point, Mumbai 400021
hotels.description: Trident Nariman Point is an elegant luxury hotel offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea from Mumbai's premier business district. The property features contemporary rooms with subtle Indian design elements, multiple dining options including authentic coastal cuisine, and an outdoor pool with cabanas. Known for its warm hospitality and efficient service, the hotel caters equally well to business travelers and leisure guests. Its central location provides easy access to Marine Drive, the Gateway of India, and South Mumbai's cultural attractions.

location.addressLineTwo: Near National Centre for Performing Arts

hotels.name: The St. Regis Mumbai
hotels.address: 462 Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai 400013
hotels.description: The St. Regis Mumbai is an ultra-luxury hotel located in the heart of Mumbai's business district, occupying the upper floors of India's tallest residential tower. The property features opulent rooms with butler service, a stunning infinity pool on the 37th floor, and exceptional dining options including By the Mekong. Guests can enjoy the Iridium Spa's signature treatments and breathtaking city views from every angle. The hotel's refined elegance and attention to detail make it a favorite among luxury travelers visiting India's financial capital.

hotels.name: JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar
hotels.address: IA Project Road, Chhatrapati Shivaji Intl Airport, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar is a luxurious airport hotel offering convenience and comfort just minutes from the international terminal. The property features elegant rooms with soundproof windows, a large outdoor pool, and multiple dining options including the award-winning Lotus Cafe. Business travelers appreciate the extensive meeting facilities and 24-hour business center, while leisure guests enjoy the spa and fitness center. The hotel's efficient airport transfers and refined service make it ideal for transit passengers and business visitors alike.

hotels.name: ITC Maratha
hotels.address: Sahar Road, Andheri East, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: ITC Maratha is a luxury hotel that celebrates Maharashtra's royal heritage through its architecture and service philosophy. The property features beautifully appointed rooms with traditional Indian design elements, a world-class Kaya Kalp spa, and exceptional dining including the famous Peshwa Pavilion. Business travelers appreciate the extensive meeting facilities, while leisure guests enjoy the outdoor pool and authentic cultural experiences. Located near the international airport, the hotel offers a perfect blend of convenience and authentic Indian hospitality.

hotels.name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
hotels.address: Off Western Express Highway, Santacruz East, Mumbai 400055
hotels.description: Grand Hyatt Mumbai is a contemporary luxury hotel set amidst 11 acres of lush gardens in the city's western suburbs. The property features spacious rooms with modern amenities, an expansive outdoor pool complex, and multiple dining options including authentic Indian cuisine at Soma. Business travelers appreciate the large convention facilities, while leisure guests enjoy the spa and proximity to the airport. The hotel's tranquil setting combined with urban convenience makes it popular for both business and social events.

hotels.name: The Leela Mumbai
hotels.address: Sahar Road, Andheri East, Mumbai 400059
hotels.description: The Leela Mumbai is a luxury hotel known for its expansive landscaped gardens and excellent service near the international airport. The property features elegant rooms with contemporary Indian decor, a lagoon-style outdoor pool, and multiple dining options including Japanese cuisine at Zen. Guests can enjoy the luxurious spa, well-equipped business center, and convenient airport transfers. The hotel's lush surroundings provide a peaceful retreat while still offering easy access to Mumbai's business and entertainment districts.

hotels.name: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach
hotels.address: Balraj Sahani Marg, Juhu Beach, Mumbai 400049
hotels.description: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach offers contemporary accommodations just steps away from Mumbai's famous Juhu Beach, blending urban convenience with coastal relaxation. The hotel features modern rooms with balconies, an outdoor pool with cabanas, and multiple dining options including The Square's international buffet. Guests appreciate the beachfront location, family-friendly facilities, and easy access to both the airport and city attractions. The property's vibrant atmosphere makes it popular with both leisure travelers and business visitors seeking a relaxed stay.

hotels.name: Hilton Mumbai International Airport
hotels.address: Sahar Airport Road, Andheri East, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: Hilton Mumbai International Airport offers comfortable accommodations with excellent connectivity to both domestic and international terminals. The hotel features modern rooms with soundproof windows, a well-equipped fitness center, and multiple dining options including Indian and international cuisine. Business travelers appreciate the meeting facilities and business center, while transit passengers value the efficient airport shuttle service. The property's convenient location makes it ideal for short stays and business trips requiring quick airport access.

hotels.name: The Orchid Hotel Mumbai
hotels.address: 70-C, Nehru Road, Near Domestic Airport, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: The Orchid Hotel Mumbai is Asia's first eco-friendly five-star hotel, located conveniently near the domestic airport. The property features comfortable rooms with sustainable design elements, multiple dining options including authentic Indian cuisine, and an eco-spa offering organic treatments. Business travelers appreciate the conference facilities and business center, while eco-conscious guests value the hotel's environmental initiatives. The convenient location provides easy access to both the airport and Mumbai's business districts.

hotels.name: Lemon Tree Premier Mumbai Airport
hotels.address: Sahar Road, Andheri East, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: Lemon Tree Premier Mumbai Airport offers vibrant, comfortable accommodations near the international airport with cheerful decor and efficient service. The hotel features modern rooms with soundproof windows, a rooftop pool with city views, and multiple dining options including the all-day dining Citrus Cafe. Business travelers appreciate the meeting rooms and business center, while transit passengers value the 24-hour airport shuttle service. The property's colorful design and friendly atmosphere make it a refreshing choice near the airport.

hotels.name: Trident Bandra Kurla
hotels.address: C-56, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai 400051
hotels.description: Trident Bandra Kurla is a luxury business hotel located in Mumbai's premier financial district, offering elegant accommodations and excellent meeting facilities. The property features contemporary rooms with modern amenities, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including authentic Indian cuisine. Corporate travelers appreciate the proximity to major business hubs and the hotel's efficient service. The convenient location provides easy access to both the airport and Mumbai's entertainment districts while maintaining a peaceful atmosphere.

hotels.name: The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake
hotels.address: 2 & 3B Near Chinmayanand Ashram, Powai, Mumbai 400087
hotels.description: The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake offers a serene lakeside retreat in the city's eastern suburbs, combining luxury with natural beauty. The property features well-appointed rooms with panoramic lake or city views, an outdoor infinity pool, and multiple dining options including authentic Indian cuisine. Guests can enjoy the Heavenly Spa, well-equipped fitness center, and peaceful walks around Powai Lake. The hotel's tranquil setting makes it ideal for both business travelers and leisure guests seeking relaxation away from the city center.

hotels.name: Radisson Blu Mumbai International Airport
hotels.address: 2nd Road, Near Domestic Airport, Mumbai 400099
hotels.description: Radisson Blu Mumbai International Airport offers comfortable accommodations with convenient access to both domestic and international terminals. The hotel features modern rooms with soundproof windows, a well-equipped fitness center, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. Business travelers appreciate the meeting facilities and business center, while transit passengers value the efficient airport shuttle service. The property's reliable service and good facilities make it a practical choice for airport stays.

hotels.name: Hotel Marine Plaza
hotels.address: 29 Marine Drive, Mumbai 400020
hotels.description: Hotel Marine Plaza is an art deco-style hotel located on Mumbai's iconic Marine Drive, offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea. The property features comfortable rooms with classic decor, a rooftop restaurant with stunning sunset views, and a convenient location near South Mumbai's attractions. Guests appreciate the old-world charm combined with modern amenities and attentive service. The hotel's prime location makes it ideal for both business travelers and tourists exploring the city's heritage sites.

hotels.name: Fariyas Hotel Mumbai
hotels.address: 25 Off Arthur Bunder Road, Colaba, Mumbai 400005
hotels.description: Fariyas Hotel Mumbai offers comfortable budget accommodations in the heart of South Mumbai's Colaba district, close to major attractions. The property features simply furnished but clean rooms, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and a convenient location near the Gateway of India and Colaba Causeway. Guests appreciate the value pricing and proximity to tourist sites, shopping, and dining options. The hotel's friendly service and central location make it popular with budget-conscious travelers exploring Mumbai's heritage areas.

hotels.name: Hotel Suba Palace
hotels.address: S.B. Marg, Near Chinmayanand Ashram, Mumbai 400013
hotels.description: Hotel Suba Palace offers basic but clean accommodations in central Mumbai at budget-friendly rates, catering primarily to business travelers and tourists. The property features simply furnished rooms with essential amenities, a 24-hour coffee shop, and a convenient location near business districts. Guests appreciate the hotel's cleanliness and value pricing, though facilities are modest. The central location provides easy access to both South Mumbai's attractions and the suburbs via public transportation.

hotels.name: Hotel Regal Enclave
hotels.address: 4th Road, Near Khar Station, Khar West, Mumbai 400052
hotels.description: Hotel Regal Enclave offers affordable accommodations in Mumbai's suburban Khar neighborhood, providing basic comforts at budget prices. The property features compact but clean rooms with essential amenities, a simple restaurant, and a convenient location near Khar railway station. While facilities are modest, guests appreciate the value pricing and proximity to both the western suburbs and South Mumbai. The hotel caters primarily to budget-conscious business travelers and tourists looking for inexpensive lodging in a residential area.

hotels.name: Hotel City Palace
hotels.address: 295 Shahid Bhagat Singh Road, Fort, Mumbai 400001
hotels.description: Hotel City Palace offers basic budget accommodations in South Mumbai's historic Fort area, providing no-frills lodging at very affordable rates. The property features simply furnished rooms with essential amenities and a convenient location near Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus and Flora Fountain. While facilities are minimal, guests appreciate the central location and value pricing for exploring Mumbai's heritage sites. The hotel caters primarily to backpackers and budget travelers needing inexpensive lodging in the city center.

hotels.name: The Leela Palace Chennai
hotels.address: Adyar Sea Face, 175, MRC Nagar, Chennai 600028
hotels.description: The Leela Palace Chennai is a magnificent beachfront luxury hotel that combines traditional South Indian architecture with contemporary elegance. The property features opulent rooms with private balconies offering stunning sea views, a world-class spa with Ayurvedic treatments, and multiple fine dining options including authentic Chettinad cuisine. Guests can enjoy the outdoor infinity pool overlooking the Bay of Bengal or relax in the lush tropical gardens. The hotel's impeccable service and attention to detail create a truly royal experience in Chennai's most prestigious address.

hotels.name: Taj Coromandel
hotels.address: 37, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Nungambakkam, Chennai 600034
hotels.description: Taj Coromandel is Chennai's most iconic luxury hotel, offering timeless elegance in the heart of the city's business district. The property features beautifully appointed rooms with classic decor, a renowned spa with traditional Indian therapies, and exceptional dining options including authentic South Indian cuisine. Business travelers appreciate the well-equipped meeting facilities and central location near corporate offices. The hotel's heritage charm combined with modern amenities makes it a favorite among discerning travelers visiting Chennai.

hotels.name: ITC Grand Chola
hotels.address: 63, Mount Road, Guindy, Chennai 600032
hotels.description: ITC Grand Chola is a majestic luxury hotel inspired by the grandeur of the Chola dynasty, offering palatial accommodations in Chennai. The property features opulent rooms with traditional South Indian design elements, one of India's largest spas, and eleven dining options including specialty restaurants. Business travelers appreciate the state-of-the-art convention center, while leisure guests enjoy the outdoor pool and cultural performances. The hotel's magnificent architecture and impeccable service create a truly regal experience in the heart of Chennai.

hotels.name: The Park Chennai
hotels.address: 601, Anna Salai, Chennai 600006
hotels.description: The Park Chennai is a contemporary luxury hotel known for its vibrant design and lively atmosphere in the heart of the city. The property features stylish rooms with modern art installations, a rooftop pool with city views, and excellent dining options including the famous 601 restaurant. The hotel's nightlife scene with its popular bars and lounges attracts both locals and guests. Business travelers appreciate the central location near corporate offices, while leisure guests enjoy the hotel's artistic ambiance and convenient access to Chennai's attractions.

hotels.name: Hyatt Regency Chennai
hotels.address: 365, Anna Salai, Teynampet, Chennai 600018
hotels.description: Hyatt Regency Chennai is a modern luxury hotel offering excellent business facilities in the city's commercial hub. The property features spacious rooms with contemporary decor, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including authentic South Indian cuisine. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, fitness center, and spa services after a day of work or sightseeing. The hotel's central location provides convenient access to both corporate offices and Chennai's cultural attractions.

hotels.name: Radisson Blu GRT Chennai
hotels.address: 531, GST Road, Chennai Airport, Chennai 600027
hotels.description: Radisson Blu GRT Chennai offers luxurious accommodations conveniently located near the international airport, making it ideal for business travelers and transit passengers. The hotel features elegant rooms with soundproof windows, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, spa services, and efficient airport transfers. The property combines comfort with convenience, providing a peaceful retreat despite its proximity to the airport.

hotels.name: The Raintree Hotel Anna Salai
hotels.address: 636, Anna Salai, Chennai 600018
hotels.description: The Raintree Hotel Anna Salai offers contemporary accommodations in central Chennai, catering primarily to business travelers. The property features comfortable rooms with modern amenities, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including South Indian specialties. Guests appreciate the hotel's central location near corporate offices and shopping districts. While primarily functional, the hotel provides all necessary comforts for business travelers at competitive rates.

hotels.name: Hilton Chennai
hotels.address: 124/1, Jawaharlal Nehru Road, Guindy, Chennai 600032
hotels.description: Hilton Chennai is a modern business hotel offering comfortable accommodations near Chennai's business districts and the airport. The property features well-appointed rooms with ergonomic workstations, a well-equipped fitness center, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. Business travelers appreciate the meeting facilities and business center, while leisure guests enjoy the outdoor pool. The hotel's convenient location makes it suitable for both corporate visitors and tourists exploring Chennai.

hotels.name: Novotel Chennai Sipcot
hotels.address: Sipcot IT Park, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Chennai 603103
hotels.description: Novotel Chennai Sipcot offers contemporary accommodations in Chennai's IT corridor, catering primarily to business travelers. The property features modern rooms with ergonomic workstations, a well-equipped business center, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool and fitness center after work. The hotel's location in the IT park makes it convenient for business visitors, while its efficient service ensures a comfortable stay.

hotels.name: LemonTree Hotel Chennai
hotels.address: 72, Sardar Patel Road, Guindy, Chennai 600032
hotels.description: LemonTree Hotel Chennai offers vibrant, comfortable accommodations in Chennai's business district at competitive rates. The property features cheerful rooms with modern amenities, a multi-cuisine restaurant, and a well-equipped business center. Guests appreciate the hotel's colorful design and friendly service, along with its convenient location near corporate offices. While primarily functional, the hotel provides all necessary comforts for business travelers at reasonable prices.

hotels.name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa
hotels.address: Benaulim Beach, Salcette, Goa 403716
hotels.description: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa is a luxurious beachfront property spread across 56 acres of lush tropical gardens along Benaulim Beach. The resort features elegant Portuguese-style villas with private pools, a world-class Jiva Spa offering Ayurvedic treatments, and multiple dining options including fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy the private beach, championship golf course, and sunset cruises on the Arabian Sea. The resort's impeccable service and tranquil atmosphere make it perfect for romantic getaways and luxury vacations in Goa.

hotels.name: The Leela Goa
hotels.address: Cavelossim Beach, Mobor, Goa 403731
hotels.description: The Leela Goa is a premium beach resort set amidst 75 acres of lush landscaped gardens along the pristine Cavelossim Beach. The property features luxurious rooms with traditional Goan-Portuguese decor, lagoon-style pools connected by waterways, and a championship golf course. Guests can enjoy the private beach, world-class spa, and multiple dining options including authentic Goan cuisine. The resort's tranquil backwaters, extensive gardens, and impeccable service create a perfect tropical paradise experience.

hotels.name: Grand Hyatt Goa
hotels.address: Bambolim, Goa 403206
hotels.description: Grand Hyatt Goa is a luxurious resort nestled along the tranquil Bambolim Bay, offering a perfect blend of Goan-Portuguese architecture and modern comforts. The property features spacious rooms with private balconies, a stunning lagoon-style pool spanning 10,000 sq ft, and multiple dining options including fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy the private beach, world-class spa, and various water sports activities. The resort's serene location away from crowded beaches makes it ideal for those seeking privacy and relaxation.

hotels.name: W Goa
hotels.address: Vagator Beach, Goa 403509
hotels.description: W Goa is a trendy boutique hotel located on the scenic Vagator Beach, known for its vibrant design and lively atmosphere. The property features stylish rooms with contemporary decor, a beach club with infinity pool, and multiple dining options including international cuisine. The hotel's nightlife scene with its famous Woo Bar attracts both guests and locals. Perfect for young travelers and couples, W Goa offers a unique blend of luxury, design, and Goan charm with spectacular ocean views.

hotels.name: ITC Grand Goa
hotels.address: Arossim Beach, Cansaulim, Goa 403712
hotels.description: ITC Grand Goa is a luxury wellness resort set along the pristine Arossim Beach, offering a perfect blend of Goan heritage and modern luxury. The property features elegant rooms with traditional design elements, a world-class Kaya Kalp Spa specializing in Ayurvedic treatments, and multiple dining options including fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy the private beach, outdoor pools, and various wellness programs. The resort's tranquil atmosphere and focus on holistic well-being make it ideal for rejuvenating vacations.

hotels.name: Park Hyatt Goa
hotels.address: Arossim Beach, Cansaulim, Goa 403712
hotels.description: Park Hyatt Goa is a secluded luxury resort inspired by Portuguese architecture, set amidst 45 acres of lush tropical gardens along Arossim Beach. The property features elegant villas with private courtyards, a stunning lagoon-style pool, and multiple dining options including authentic Goan cuisine. Guests can enjoy the private beach, world-class spa, and various water sports activities. The resort's tranquil atmosphere and personalized service create an intimate and luxurious Goan experience.
